ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He erected heaven and established the balance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He raised the sky and set the Balance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and He has raised up the heaven and has set a balance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He raised the heavens and set up everything in balance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Allah has raised the sky; and He has set the balance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the heaven He has raised high, and He has set up the balance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the heaven, He raised it high, and He made the balance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and heaven -- He raised it up, and set the Balance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the sky He hath uplifted; and He hath set the measure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He raised the heavens and set up the measure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the heaven! He hath elevated it, and He hath set the balance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He raised the heaven high and set up the balance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the Firmament has He raised high, and He has set up the Balance (of Justice),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the heaven He has raised high, and He has set up the Balance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He raised the heaven on high and set the scale.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the sky, He raised; and He set up the balance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:7] And He has raised the heaven and set up the balance, He has established justice,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the sky He hath uplifted) above everything; such that nothing touches it; (and He hath set the measure) on the earth; He explained fair measure through the scale,
